mapper.select: SELECT sn.*,le.emp_number as emp_number, le.emp_mobile as empMobile from lx_manager sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id WHERE sn.manager_admin=#{username}
SELECT sn.*,le.emp_number as emp_number, le.emp_mobile as empMobile from lx_manager sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id WHERE sn.EMP_ID=#{empId}
SELECT sn.*,le.emp_number as emp_number, le.emp_mobile as empMobile from lx_manager sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id WHERE sn.manager_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LX_MANAGER(MANAGER_ID, MANAGER_ADMIN, MANAGER_PASS, IS_USE, PERMISSIONS, emp_id, manager_cover) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{isUse}, #{permissions, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_cover, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE LX_MANAGER SET MANAGER_PASS=#{pass} WHERE MANAGER_ID=#{id}
UPDATE LX_MANAGER SET permissions=#{permissions} WHERE MANAGER_ID=#{id}
UPDATE LX_MANAGER SET is_use=#{is_use} WHERE MANAGER_ID=#{id}
